author: kwright
msg: Part of CONNECTORS-387.  Site build now makes a copy of Forrest and modifies the configuration in order to allow us to set the PDF fonts.  Unfortunately this still does not work for .ttc fonts because the 'sub-font' attribute seems not to work with FOP 1.0, so I've left that part commented out.
